name: Computer Science Club

longDescription: To explore computer science concepts as a team.

shortDescription: Grow your business and professional skills
longDescription: Grow your business and professional skills

longDescription: To learn how to use sign language in social situations to spread awareness of deaf culture and sign language.

name: Artificial Intelligence Club
shortDescription: To gain a better understanding of artificial intelligence.
longDescription: To gain a better understanding of artificial intelligence.

longDescription: To grow produce for those in need of food by donating to the food bank.

longDescription: To gather like-minded students to serve and raise awareness for the veterans on campus and in the community.

name: Biomed for Youth
shortDescription: To support students with access to education-based resources, specifically in the medical field.
longDescription: To support students with access to education-based resources, specifically in the medical field.

shortDescription: To bring together BHS students who enjoy reading and discussing literature.
longDescription: To bring together BHS students who enjoy reading and discussing literature.

longDescription: To create a safe place for men to talk about their faith and experiences with Christ.

name: Claw Crew

longDescription: To promote spirit and pride throughout Bridgeland.

longDescription: To share and get constructive feedback on writing and explore and hone craft.

longDescription: To advise freshmen on how to be successful in high school.

longDescription: To develop students into servant leaders and help them reach their full potential.

longDescription: To unite athletes to praise God and play sports with a Christian mindset.

longDescription: To motivate and educate students who wish to pursue a medical career.

longDescription: To develop leadership, personal growth, and career success through agricultural education.

longDescription: To provide a safe place to discuss experiences, learn the Bible, and make Godly friendships.

longDescription: To share the joy of gardening.
